meanings.definition: An unspecified amount or number of something.
meanings.sent1: I need to buy some apples for the pie.
meanings.sent2: She found some shells on the beach.
meanings.sent3: He brought some magic beans to the party.
meanings.sent4: The forest was filled with some mysterious creatures.
meanings.sent5: In the treasure chest, there were some glittering jewels.

meanings.definition: A certain amount or number of something.
meanings.sent1: There are some cookies left in the jar.
meanings.sent2: He ate some of the cake at the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat caught some fish for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The garden had some colorful flowers blooming.
meanings.sent5: She received some lovely gifts for her birthday.

meanings.definition: A portion or part of something.
meanings.sent1: Please pass me some of the pizza.
meanings.sent2: He only took some of the books from the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel buried some of the nuts in the garden.
meanings.sent4: She shared some of her sandwich with her friend.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted some of the sky in shades of pink.
